ComicInfo.Summary:
MAD deals Celebrity Poker Showdown a bad hand, and takes a swipe at Ben Affleck's poker face. MAD also delivers some bad news for Dan Rather's final broadcast, shoots down HBO's Deadwood and tosses dirt on a typical red-carpet pre-awards show!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-12-11 23:06:50. [Issue ID 129286]
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/mad-452-celebrity-poker-issue/4000-129286/
